review: Like it. It was a breeze to install and use.
author: Amazon Customer

review: LOVE IT! Like using a remote instead of my phone. However, they could do more to make it easier to Navigate. There's way too much unnecessary clutter. And be careful what you select...you might find yourself getting charged...I did. Other than that, I think you'll be happy with it!
author: Lynn Manyfires

review: Fire stick came quickly and was everything that it was advertised to be. I love it!
author: Chelsea Robinson

review: It's pretty cool, set up was literally 20 seconds.
author: Daniel K

review: plenty to choose from something for everyone. installation a breeze. works well.
author: K S KECK

review: Love, love, love it!!!! A great product.  Easy to install and ready to in 5 minutes.
author: Terri L Bunn

review: The best quality and most versatile streaming device I've tried. Gave away the others after seeing the ease of control and data entry with this.  Usually seems to deliver better quality video than the other little boxes (Chromecast, Vizio, Roku).
author: Greg Anderson
